import React,{useState} from 'react'; import './stars.css' import './DoctorCard.css' const DoctorCard = (props) => { const [showModal, setShowModal]=useState(false) return (
{props.name}

Age: {props.age}

Specialty: {props.specialty}

Experience: {props.experience} Years

Works At {props.clinicName}, {props.city}

{showModal ? ( <>

{/*content*/}
{/*header*/}

Book an appointment

{/* */}

Available Slots:-

) : null}
); }; export default DoctorCard;
